title: Playgrounds for free
brief_description: Shows the construction of more than a dozen community built playgrounds throughout Pennsylvania under a special playground program. Shows how to use old tyres, oil drums, cable reels and other used materials. Tells how to assess resources, and puts the problem of vandalism in perspective.
